title: Courage The Cowardly Dog (iPod)
description:
I didn't rip these myself, I just took the files from edtallica's torrentand converted them to iPod format. I used Xilisoft and converted the files to Ipod video2 (640x480) So, just the same, I am missing "The Wind Whispers Courage" and "They Must Be Giants" Not sure how well these work on older ipods, but I know it works perfectly on ipod classic. I decided to do this because it took me forever to convert them all, so thought I'd save some people some time. Sorry if initial seeding is slow.

Thanks


PLEASE SEED WHEN FINISHED
